version_description:
• Support segment selection and filter
• Support multiple accounts
• Support downloading media
• Other improvements

• Added filter for ghost followers
• Added filter for inactive users
• Added option to load all items at once
• More improvements

• Fixed issue where filtering users took forever
• Performance improvements
• Frameworks update

Thank you all for your feedback and suggestions. We try to review all of the feedback carefully and keep improving the app as much as possible. Stay with us. More updates are coming soon.

• Fixed issue where selecting non-followers and non-following didn't work properly
• Fixed crashes
• Frameworks update

• Added Task queue. Now it saves all pending tasks and automatically retries when limit exceeded, simultaneously for multiple accounts.
• Added settings for Ghost filter.
• Added quick select for Whitelist and Blocked users.

• Fixed in-app purchase bug.
• Fixed issue where mutual friendship indicator not showing properly.

Version 2.0.1:
• Fixed crashes.
• Added Stop button when load all items.

Version 2.0:
• Added Task queue. Now it saves all pending tasks and automatically retries when limit exceeded, simultaneously for multiple accounts.
• Added settings for Ghost filter.
• Added quick select for Whitelist and Blocked users.

• Fixed in-app purchase bug.
• Fixed issue where mutual friendship indicator not showing properly.
• Fixed a bug causing crash on startup

• Added action Remove followers
• Fixed some minor bugs
